sense.gloss: a gathering of many beautiful women (talented people), simultaneous emergence of many talents and achievements, hundred flowers blooming in profusion
profusely (esp. flowers blooming in great profusion)

sdata.j: プレステ２↑発売↑↓はつばい↓↑後↑↓ご↓、ゲームソフト↑売↑↓う↓り↑場↑↓ば↓は↑百花↑↓ひゃっか↓↑撩乱↑↓りょうらん↓↑状態↑↓じょうたい↓だ。
sdata.e: Since PlayStation 2 came out the game software store shelves have bloomed riotously with colorful new titles.
